text: Meana Sardo (Meàna) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Nuoro in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,813 people lived there. Its area is 73.8 km². It is 588 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Nuoro
title: Meana Sardo
